name: MAJOR BLUE AIR PTY LTD
about: Major Blue Air, based in Maun, Botswana, on the edge of the Okavango Delta, is a premier air charter service specializing in scenic flights, luxury safari bush camp transfers, and private business charters across Botswana, Namibia, Zambia, South Africa, and beyond. With a focus on safety, efficiency, and passenger comfort, our experienced team and top-of-the-line fleet ensure an exceptional travel experience. We offer stunning aerial views of wildlife and landscapes, including the Chobe River and Caprivi Strip. Our services are tailored to provide personal and attentive air travel, making Major Blue Air the ideal choice for your next adventure.
services:
["Trial Introductory Flight
Recreational Pilot License (RPL)
Private Pilot License (PPL)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Night VFR Endorsement (NVFR)
Multi Engine Instrument Rating
Single Engine Instrument Rating
Multi Engine Class Rating
Flight Instructor Rating (30 hours)"]
